Spells-Occult -- Male Skilled Heritage Human Bard: 12
Strength: 18 (+4) Dexterity: 16 (+3) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 14 (+2) Wisdom: 14 (+2) Charisma: 18 (+4)
Background: Acrobat Alignment: Chaotic Neutral Deity: Calistra (CN)
Experience: 11706/12000 Level: 12 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 12 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 3; Class: 7; General: 3; Skill: 6 Selectable Feature Count: Bard (Muse); Human (Heritage)

Skilled Heritage Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Untrained Improvisation: +12 on untrained skill checks
Vigilant Senses: Perception Master
Clever Improviser: May use any skill untrained
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures; normal failures give twice the income
Impressive Performance: May use Performance to Make an Impression
Know-It-All: A successful Recall Knowledge grants additional information
Melodious Spell: (1) May hide spellcasting from observers with a successful Performance vs. Perception
Quick Squeeze: May Squeeze 5'/rd, or 10'/rd on a critical success
Steady Balance: All Balance successes are critical successes/Never flat-footed during Balance/May use Acrobatics to Grab an Edge
Versatile Performance: May use Performance in place of Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation
Virtuosic Performer: +1 checks on chosen Performance type
Combat
Hit Points: 128 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Blowgun (+19 1 P R20'; dexterity; expert); Sling (+19 1d6+2 B R50'; dexterity; expert); Spiked Gauntlet (+20 1d4+4 P; strength; expert)

Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Orc Necksplitter as one category simpler
Weapon Proficiency (Shortbow): Attack Trained (Shortbow)
Bard Weapon Expertise: May use critical specialization effects of any simple weapon, unarmed attack, longsword, rapier, sap, shortbow, shortsword, and whip
Save: Fortitude: +18 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +19 (dexterity; expert); Will: +20 (wisdom; master)

Great Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: O0: 5; O1: 3; O2: 3; O3: 3; O4: 3; O5: 3; O6: 3 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Occult: +20 (charisma; expert) Spell DC: Occult: 30 (charisma; expert)
Spells:
Abundant Step (O4 Con): (1) Allows caster to teleport 25' within line of sight
Abyssal Plague (O5 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts drained 1 and cannot recover for 1 day or until cured (save Fortitude inflicts 2 HP evil per spell level and -2 saves vs. Abyssal plague for 1 day; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts drained 2)
Alarm (O1 Abj): (10 min) 20' burst triggers choice of a mental or audible alarm when a Small or larger corporeal creature enters without saying a specified password for 8 hr
Allegro (O0 Enc): (1) R30' Target becomes quickened and may take an additional Strike, Stride, or Step for 1 rd
Alter Reality (O10 Div): (3) Duplicates the effects of a known spell of up to 9th level or of a common spell of up to 7th level
Antimagic Field (O8 Abj): (3) 10' emanation disables spells and magic items while sustained for up to 1 min
Augury (O2 Div): (10 min) Caster may gain a general idea of whether the results of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future will be good or bad
Bane (O1 Enc): (2) 5' emanation inflicts -1 attack on foes for 1 min; caster may use an action each rd to increase the radius by 5' (save Will negates)
Banishment (O5 Abj): (2) R30' Returns target to its home plane (save Will (-2 if cast using a target anathema) negates; critical success inflicts stunned 1 on caster; critical failure prevents target return for 1 week) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Bind Soul (O9 Nec): (2) R30' Entraps the soul of a corpse dead less than 1 min in a gem until counteracted or gem is destroyed
Bind Undead (O3 Nec): (2) R30' Controls the actions of a mindless undead of level less than or equal to the spell level for 1 day
Black Tentacles (O5 Con): (3) R120' Successful attack vs. Fortitude DC in a 20' burst inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning and grabbed for 1 min, plus 1d6 HP bludgeoning each rd on grabbed creatures; escaping requires success vs. a DC 30 on an unarmed attack or inflicting 12 HP vs. AC 30
Bless (O1 Enc): (2) 5' radius gives allies +1 attack for 1 min; caster may use a concentrate action to extend to 10'
Blindness (O3 Nec): (2) R30' Blinds target for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last until next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent blindness)
Blink (O4 Con): (2) Caster gains resistance 5 to non-force damage and may use Sustain to randomly teleport 10' for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +3 resistance)
Blur (O2 Ill): (2) Touched becomes concealed for 1 min
Calm Emotions (O2 Enc): (2) R120' 10' burst calms creatures and prevents them from taking hostile actions while maintained up to 1 min; hostile actions aimed at a creature end (save Will inflicts -1 attack; critical success negates; critical failure allows spell to continue after hostile actions)
Charm (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly (save Will negates; critical success target notices spell; critical failure makes target helpful)
Chill Touch (O0 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts 1d4+4 HP negative on a living creature (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd) or flat-footed on an undead for 1 rd (save Fortitude negates; critical failure also inflicts fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP on living)
Chromatic Wall (O5 Abj): (3) R120' 60'x30' wall shines 20' light and inflicts randomly-chosen effects on passing objects for 10 min: (1) destroys ammunition and inflicts 20 HP fire on creatures (save basic Reflex; Cone Of Cold counteracts); (2) destroys thrown weapons and inflicts 25 HP acid on creatures (save basic Reflex; Gust Of Wind counteracts); (3) negates energy effects and inflicts 30 HP electricity on creatures (save basic Reflex; Disintegrate counteracts); (4) blocks gasses and inflicts 10 poison and enfeebled 1 for 1 min on creatures (save basic Fortitude also negates enfeebled; Passwall counteracts) (heightened 7th effects last 1 hr, inflicts +10 HP, and adds more effects possibilities: (5) negates petrification, sonic, and visual effects and inflicts Flesh To Stone on creatures (Magic Missile counteracts); (6) negates divination and mental effects and inflicts Warp Mind on creatures (Searing Light counteracts); (7) negates targeted spells and inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min on creatures (save Will negates; critical failure teleports to another plane; Dispel Magic counteracts); (8) effects as with another option, but inflicts -2 saves)
Circle Of Protection (O3 Abj): (3) 10' emanation around touched gives +1 AC and saves vs. creatures of specified alignment, and +3 vs. summoned creatures and on effects that control touched, for 1 min (heightened 4th effects last for 1 hr)
Clairaudience (O3 Div): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows the caster to listen from the target location for 10 min
Clairvoyance (O4 Div): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows the caster to see from the target location for 10 min
Cloak Of Colors (O5 Ill): (2) R30' Creatures adjacent to target suffer dazzled, and attackers suffer blinded for 1 rd, for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts stunned for 1 rd)
Collective Transposition (O6 Con): (2) Teleports 2 targets within a 30' radius (save Will negates; critical success allows target to control teleport) (heightened +1 affects +1 target)
Color Spray (O1 Ill): (2) 15' cone inflicts stunned 1, blinded for 1 rd, and dazzled for 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled for 1 rd only; critical success negates; critical failure extends blindness to 1 min)
Command (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Target obeys a command to approach, run away, drop a held object, drop prone, or stand in place for 1 rd (save Will negates; critical failure causes target to use all actions on next turn to obey)
Comprehend Language (O2 Div): (2) R30' Allows target to understand choice of heard language for 1 hr (heightened 3rd target may also speak language; 4th affects 10 targets)
Confusion (O4 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts confused for 1 min or until a successful save (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure allows no further save attempts)
Continual Flame (O2 Evo): (3) Touched object glows as a torch until dismissed
Counter Performance (O1 Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' radius may substitute caster Performance roll for save
Crushing Despair (O5 Enc): (2) 30' cone prevents Reactions and inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min (save Will inflicts slowed 1 for 1 turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min)
Dancing Lights (O0 Evo): (2) R120' Creates 4 floating torch lights in a 10' radius that may be moved 60' each rd while sustained
Darkness (O2 Evo): (2) R120' 20' burst counteracts natural light and magical light of equal or lesser level (heightened 4th causes creatures with darkvision to treat targets within darkness as concealed)
Darkvision (O2 Div): (2) Allows caster to see in darkness for 1 hr (heightened 3rd affects touched target; 5th lasts until next daily prep)
Daze (O0 Enc): (2) R60' Target suffers 4 HP mental (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts double HP plus stunned 1) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Deafness (O2 Nec): (2) R30' Deafens target for 10 min (save Fortitude effects last 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent deafness)
Death Knell (O2 Nec): (2) Kills touched target with 0 HP and gives caster 10 temporary HP and +1 attack and damage for 10 min (save Will increases target's dying value by 1; critical success negates)
Death Ward (O5 Abj): (2) Touched gains +4 saves vs. death and negative effects, negative resistance 10, and suppressed doomed effects for 10 min
Detect Alignment (O1 Div): (2) 30' emanation allows the caster to detect auras of specified alignment (heightened 2nd reveals each aura's location and strength)
Detect Magic (O0 Div): (2) 30' emanation allows the caster to discern the presence of magic and detect illusions of up to the spell level (heightened 3rd reveals school of highest-level effect; 4th reveals source of highest-level effect)
Detect Scrying (O4 Div): (2) 30' emanation allows the caster to learn of scrying effects, along with the scrying creature for lower-level effects, for 1 hr (heightened 6th effects last until next daily prep)
Dimension Door (O4 Con): (2) R120' Teleports caster to a visible target location
Dimensional Anchor (O4 Abj): (2) R30' Allows a counteract attempt vs. any effect that would move target to a different plane for 10 min (save Will effects last 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure effects last 1 hr)
Dimensional Lock (O7 Abj): (2) R120' 60' burst allows counteract attempts vs. any teleportation or planar travel until next daily prep
Dirge Of Doom (O0 Enc): (1) 30' emanation inflicts frightened 1 on foes for 1 rd
Disappearance (O8 Ill): (2) Touched becomes undetectable by any sense for 10 min
Discern Lies (O4 Div): (2) Caster gains +4 Perception vs. lies for 10 min
Discern Location (O8 Div): (10 min) Caster knows the exact location of a specified familiar creature or object for 10 min
Dispel Magic (O2 Abj): (2) R120' Allows a counteract check to remove 1 spell effect from the target or to make a magic item inert for 10 min
Dominate (O6 Enc): (2) R30' Caster controls the actions of the target until next daily prep; a successful save at end of each turn ends (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts control allowing further saves only upon repugnant orders) (heightened 10th effects are permanent)
Dream Council (O8 Ill): (10 min) Allows 12 known targets to communicate through a shared dream for 1 hr
Dream Message (O3 Enc): (10 min) Allows the caster to send 1 min of speech to a familiar creature (heightened 4th allows sending speech to 10 familiar creatures)
Dreaming Potential (O5 Enc): (10 min) Allows touched to achieve a day of downtime retraining during 8 hr sleep
Duplicate Foe (O7 Con): (3) R30' Creates a copy of a target up to level 15 under the caster's control with 70 HP and no special abilities while sustained for up to 1 min or until reduced to 0 HP; the copy loses 4d6 HP each turn (save Fortitude copy inflicts half HP and lasts 2 rd; critical success negates) (heightened +1 may create a copy of a target up to level 17 with 80 HP)
Empty Body (O9 Con): (2) Caster moves to the Ethereal Plane for 1 min
Energy Aegis (O7 Abj): (1 min) Touched gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, negative, positive, and sonic damage for 1 min (heightened 9th gives resistance 10)
Enthrall (O3 Enc): (2) Fascinates creatures within 120' while sustained (save Will each rd or upon disagreement negates; critical success target notices attempt; critical failure allows no further saves for disagreement)
Ethereal Jaunt (O7 Con): (2) Caster moves to the Ethereal Plane while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 9th R30' affects up to 5 additional willing creatures and lasts 10 min)
Fabricated Truth (O10 Enc): (3) R100' 5 targets believe a specified statement for 1 week (save Will negates; critical success target notices attempt; critical failure target believes statement permanently)
Faerie Fire (O2 Evo): (2) R120' 10' burst makes concealed creatures visible and invisible creatures concealed for 5 min
False Life (O2 Nec): (2) Caster gains 10 temporary HP for 8 hr (heightened +1 gives +3 HP)
False Vision (O5 Ill): (10 min) Allows the caster to control the image shown by scrying a 100' burst until next daily prep
Fatal Aria (O10 Enc): (1) R30' Inflicts death (target up to level 16 or 50 HP), 0 HP and dying 1 (target level 17), or 50 HP (target level 18+)
Fear (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3, and the target flees for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Feeblemind (O6 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts stupefied 4 until curse is removed (save Will inflicts stupefied 2 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure permanently changes a PC into an NPC, inflicting animal intelligence and -5 Charisma, Intelligence, and Wisdom modifiers)
Floating Disk (O1 Con): (2) Creates an invisible 2' radius disk that follows the caster and holds 5 Bulk for 8 hr
Fly (O4 Tra): (2) Touched gains a fly Speed of the greater of its Speed or 20' for 5 min (heightened 7th effects last 1 hr)
Forbidding Ward (O0 Abj): (2) R30' Target gains +1 AC and saves vs. specified foe while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 bonus)
Foresight (O9 Div): (2) Touched gains +2 initiative and negates flat-footed vs. undetected and flanking creatures, and caster may use a Reaction to give the target the better of two rolls in response to danger, for 1 hr
Gaseous Form (O4 Tra): (2) Touched becomes vapor with resistance 8 to physical damage, immunity to precision damage, proficiency modifier for unarmored defense, and 10' fly Speed for 5 min or until the target or the caster ends the spell
Gate (O10 Con): (2) R120' Opens a 40' radius gate to another plane while sustained for up to 1 min
Gentle Repose (O2 Nec): (2) Touched corpse resists decay and cannot be made undead until next daily prep (heightened 5th effects are permanent)
Ghost Sound (O0 Ill): (2) R30' Creates sound equivalent to four humans shouting while sustained (heightened 3rd R60'; 5th R120')
Ghostly Weapon (O3 Tra): (2) Touched weapon becomes translucent and can affect incorporeal creatures for 5 min
Ghoulish Cravings (O2 Nec): (2) Touched suffers 3d8 HP negative and regains half HP for 1 day (save Fortitude negates; critical failure inflicts 3d8 HP negative and regains no HP for 1 day)
Glibness (O4 Enc): (2) Caster gains +4 Deception to lie and against Perception to discern truth, plus level if untrained, for 10 min
Globe Of Invulnerability (O4 Abj): (2) 10' burst inflicts Dispel Magic effects for 10 min
Glyph Of Warding (O3 Abj): (10 min) Target container or 10'x10' area triggers a chosen spell of lower level in response to a specified trigger
Grim Tendrils (O1 Nec): (2) 30' line inflicts 2d4 HP negative and 1 HP persistent bleed on living creatures (save Fortitude inflicts half negative HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double negative and persistent bleed HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d4 HP negative and +1 HP persistent bleed
Guidance (O1 Div): (2) R30' Target gains +1 on choice of attack, Perception, save, or skill check before the start of the caster's next turn; cannot be repeated on the same target for 1 hr
Hallucination (O5 Ill): (2) R30' Changes target's perception of 1 object (save Will target knows that it's hallucinating; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts -4 saves to disbelieve)
Hallucinatory Terrain (O4 Ill): (10 min) R500' Illusion changes look, sound, feel, and smell of terrain until next daily prep (heightened 5th illusion may mask or incorporate structures)
Haste (O3 Tra): (2) R30' Target gains an extra Strike or Stride action each rd for 1 min (heightened 7th affects 6 targets)
Heroism (O3 Enc): (2) Touched gains +1 attack, Perception, saves, and skill checks for 10 min (heightened 6th gives +2 bonus; 8th gives +3 bonus)
Hideous Laughter (O2 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 and loss of Reactions while sustained (save Will inflicts loss of Reactions only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts prone for 1 rd, then slowed 1 and loss of Reactions)
House Of Imaginary Walls (O0 Ill): (1) Creates an invisible, illusionary, 10'x10' wall with AC 10, double the spell level Hardness, and quadruple the spell level HP, for 1 rd
Humanoid Form (O2 Tra): (2) Caster transforms into choice of Small or Medium humanoid and gains +4 Deception to pass as the chosen ancestry (heightened 3rd caster gains darkvision or low-light vision if appropriate to ancestry; 5th caster may transform into a Large humanoid)
Hypercognition (O3 Div): (1) Allows caster to use 6 Recall Knowledge actions immediately
Hypnotic Pattern (O3 Ill): (2) R120' 10' burst inflicts dazzled and fascinated while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will dazzled only; critical failure inflicts loss of Reactions)
Illusory Creature (O2 Ill): (2) R500' Creates an illusory image of a Large or smaller creature (AC 30; +20 attack; 1d4+4 HP nonlethal mental damage; +20 saves) while sustained or until damaged; each Sustain allows the caster to direct two actions (heightened +1 creature inflicts +1d4 HP and may be one size larger)
Illusory Disguise (O1 Ill): (2) Illusion makes the caster appear different for 1 hr (heightened 2nd also disguises voice and scent; 3rd may copy a specific individual)
Illusory Object (O1 Ill): (2) R500' Creates an illusion of a stationary object in a 20' burst for 10 min (heightened 2nd illusion includes sounds and smells; 5th effects are permanent)
Illusory Scene (O5 Ill): (10 min) R500' Creates in a 30' burst a moving illusion with up to 10 creatures or objects, sounds, and smells for 1 hr (heightened 6th creatures in the scene can speak; 8th effects are permanent)
Inspire Competence (O0 Enc): (1) R60' Allows the caster to use Performance to Aid an ally skill check, with normal failure counting as a success, for 1 rd
Inspire Courage (O0 Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Inspire Defense (O0 Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives +1 AC and saves, plus resistance of half the spell level to physical damage, for 1 rd
Inspire Heroics (O4 Enc): (F) Allows the caster to use Performance to increase the effects of a subsequent Inspire Courage or Inspire Defense to +2 (critical success gives +3; failure does not expend a Focus Point)
Invisibility (O2 Ill): (2) Touched becomes invisible for 10 min or until it uses a hostile action (heightened 4th lasts 1 min, and hostile action does not end)
Invisibility Sphere (O3 Ill): (2) 10' emanation makes creatures within invisible for 10 min or until any affected performs a hostile act (heightened 5th lasts for 1 hr)
Item Facade (O1 Ill): (2) Makes the target object up to a 10' cube appear decrepit or perfect for 1 hr (heightened 2nd lasts 24 hr; 3rd effects are permanent)
Ki Blast (O3 Evo): (1) 15' cone (2/3 actions give a 30'/60' cone) inflicts 2d6 HP force (2/3 actions inflicts 3d6/4d6 HP) (save Fortitude inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and 10' push) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP for 1 action or +2d6 HP for 2 or 3)
Ki Rush (O1 Tra): (1) Allows the caster to move twice and makes the caster concealed until next turn
Ki Strike (O1 Tra): (1) Gives the caster +1 attack and +1d6 HP force, lawful, negative, or positive with an unarmed Strike or Flurry Of Blows (heightened +4 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Knock (O2 Tra): (2) R30' Gives a +4 bonus to anyone who tries to use Athletics or Thievery to open the target object for 1 min
Know Direction (O0 Div): (2) Tells the caster which direction is north (heightened 7th gives direction to a familiar location)
Levitate (O3 Evo): (2) Allows the caster to use an action to move the touched object or willing creature up or down 10' for 5 min
Light (O0 Evo): (2) Touched object lights a 20' radius until next daily prep (heightened 4th lights a 60' radius)
Lingering Composition (O1 Enc): (F) Allows a Performance check to increase the duration of a subsequent cantrip composition to 3 rd (critical success 4 rd; failure does not expend a Focus Point)
Locate (O3 Div): (10 min) R500' Reveals direction to a named object or the nearest object of a named type while sustained (heightened 5th reveals direction to a creature or ancestry)
Lock (O1 Abj): (2) Touched latch or lock opens only for caster until next daily prep; a successful DC 30 Athletics or Thievery check (or +4 lock DC if higher) ends the spell (heightened 2nd effects are permanent)
Loremaster's Etude (O1 Div): (F) R30' Target may take the better of two Recall Knowledge rolls
Mage Armor (O1 Abj): (2) Caster gains +1 AC with a +5 maximum Dexterity modifier until next daily prep (heightened 4th also gives +1 saves; 6th gives +2 AC)
Mage Hand (O0 Evo): (2) R30' Allows the caster to move a light object 20' per rd while sustained (heightened 3rd may move a Bulk 1 object; 5th may move 60' per rd; 7th may move a Bulk 2 object)
Magic Aura (O1 Ill): (1 min) Allows the caster to alter the magical aura of the target object, making it appear as non-magical, as a common magical item of up to twice the spell level, or as under the effects of a spell of up to the spell level, until next daily prep (heightened 3rd may target a creature)
Magic Missile (O1 Evo): (1) R120' 1 missile per action inflicts 1d4+1 HP force (heightened +2 gives 1 additional missile per action)
Magic Mouth (O2 Ill): (2) Illusory mouth appears on a touched creature or object and speaks a specified message up to 25 words the next time a specified trigger occurs within 30'
Magic Weapon (O1 Tra): (2) Touched weapon gains +1 attack and a second damage die for 1 min
Magnificent Mansion (O7 Con): (1 min) R30' Creates an entrance to a 40'x40'x40' demiplane that may only be entered by those specified, is staffed by servants, and contains provisions for up to 150 people
Mariner's Curse (O5 Nec): (2) Touched suffers sickened 1, plus slowed 1 on the open sea, until the curse is removed (save Will inflicts sickened 1 until the condition is reduced; critical success negates; critical success inflicts sickened 2)
Mask Of Terror (O7 Ill): (2) R30' Target inflicts frightened 2 for 1 rd on attackers for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure prevents attack) (heightened 8th affects 5 targets)
Maze (O8 Con): (2) R30' Transports the target to an extradimensional maze while sustained or until a critical success or 2 successive normal successes on a DC 30 Survival or Perception check
Mending (O1 Tra): (10 min) Restores 5 HP per spell level to a light, non-magical object (heightened 2nd may affect a 1 Bulk object; 3rd may affect a 2 Bulk or magical 1 Bulk object)
Message (O0 Ill): (1) R120' Allows the caster to hold a private conversation with a visible target for 1 turn (heightened 3rd R500')
Mind Blank (O8 Abj): (2) R30' Target gains +4 saves vs. mental effects and automatic +1 spell level counteract attempts vs. detection, revelation, and scrying until next daily prep
Mind Probe (O5 Div): (1 min) R30' Allows the caster to gain answers from the target, requiring a DC 30 Deception check to refuse to answer each, with critical success giving a believable false answer (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts -4 Deception)
Mind Reading (O3 Div): (2) R30' Allows the caster to learn surface thoughts of the target and whether its intelligence is higher, lower, or equal (save Will reveals relative intelligence only; critical success allows the target to learn the caster's surface thoughts instead; critical failure allows sustaining for up to 1 min with no further save attempts)
Mindlink (O1 Div): (2) Telepathically transmits 10 min of information from caster to touched target
Mirror Image (O2 Ill): (2) Creates three duplicates that have an equal chance of misdirecting attacks on the caster for 1 min; any hit on a duplicate destroys it, and a critical success also hits the caster with a normal success
Misdirection (O2 Ill): (1 min) R30' Changes the magical aura of one target to mimic a second target until next daily prep
Mislead (O6 Ill): (2) Turns the caster invisible and creates an illusory duplicate while sustained for up to 1 min
Modify Memory (O4 Div): (2) R30' Changes 1 rd of the target's memory each rd while sustained for up to 5 min (save Will negates; critical success target notices attempt)
Nightmare (O4 Ill): (10 min) Causes a familiar target to have nightmares and awaken fatigued (save Will inflicts nightmares only; critical success negates; critical failure also inflicts drained 2 until no longer fatigued)
Nondetection (O3 Abj): (10 min) Touched gains automatic counteract attempts vs. magical divinations for 8 hr
Outcast's Curse (O4 Enc): (2) Touched suffers one step worse initial attitudes and the worse of two Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Performance rolls until removed (save Will effects last 10 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts initial attitudes two steps worse)
Overwhelming Presence (O9 Enc): (2) 40' burst inflicts fascinated and forces creatures to pay tribute once per turn for six turns (save Will affected must pay tribute only twice; critical success negates; critical failure causes affected to use all actions each turn to pay tribute)
Paralyze (O3 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts paralyzed for 1 rd (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts paralyzed for 4 rounds, allowing subsequent saves to shorten or end the effects) (heightened 7th affects 10 targets)
Paranoia (O2 Ill): (2) R30' Target becomes unfriendly to all others for 1 min (save Will effects last 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure causes target to treat all others an enemies) (heightened 6th effects 5 targets)
Phantasmal Calamity (O6 Ill): (2) R500' 30' burst inflicts 11d6 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1 and trapped until a successful subsequent Will save) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Phantasmal Killer (O4 Ill): (2) R120' Inflicts 8d6 HP mental and frightened 2 (save Will inflicts 4d6 HP mental and frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts death on a failed Fortitude save or 12d6 HP mental, fleeing for 1 rd, and frightened 1 on success) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP or +3d6 HP on critical failure)
Phantom Pain (O1 Ill): (2) R30' Inflicts 2d4 HP mental, 1d4 HP persistent mental, and sickened 1 for 1 min or until no longer sickened (save Will inflicts initial HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d4 HP initial and +1d4 HP persistent)
Phantom Steed (O2 Con): (10 min) R30' Conjures a magical mount (AC 20, HP 10, 40' Speed) that can only be ridden by a designated creature for 8 hr (heightened 4th mount has 60' Speed and can move normally over water and natural difficult terrain; 5th mount may also Air Walk for 1 rd; 6th mount has 80' Speed and may fly)
Plane Shift (O7 Con): (10 min) Transports caster and 8 willing targets to a different plane
Possession (O7 Nec): (2) R30' Caster inhabits and controls the target's body for 1 min (save Will the caster inhabits but cannot control; critical success negates; critical failure gives the caster full control; success on subsequent Will saves each turn negates caster control for 1 rd, and critical success ends the spell) (heightened 9th effects last 10 min, and the caster's body is protected from harm)
Prestidigitation (O0 Evo): (2) R10' Performs choice of cooking, lifting, making a minor object, or tidying while sustained
Prismatic Sphere (O9 Abj): (2) R10' 10' radius emits 20' bright light, inflicting blindness for 1 rd (save Will inflicts dazzled for 1 rd; critical failure inflicts blindness for 1 min), and that inflicts these effects on creatures passing through for 1 hr: 20 HP fire (save basic Reflex); 25 HP acid (save basic Reflex); 30 HP electricity (save basic Reflex); 10 HP poison and enfeebled 1 for 1 min (save basic Fortitude also negates enfeebled); Flesh To Stone effects (save Will negates); Warp Mind effects (save Will negates); slowed 1 for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts Plane Shift effects)
Prismatic Spray (O7 Evo): (2) 30' cone inflicts a random effect: (1) 50 HP fire; (2) 60 HP acid; (3) 70 HP electricity; (4) 30 HP poison and enfeebled 1 for 1 min; (5) Flesh To Stone effects; (6) Warp Mind effects; (7) slowed 1 for 1 min; (8) two of the preceding effects (save Reflex (1), (2), (3), Fortitude (4), (5), or Will (6), (7) negates; critical failure on (7) also inflicts Plane Shift effects)
Prismatic Wall (O8 Abj): (3) R120' Creates a 60'x30' wall that emits 20' bright light, inflicting blindness for 1 rd (save Will inflicts dazzled for 1 rd; critical failure inflicts blindness for 1 min), and that inflicts these effects on creatures passing through for 1 hr: 20 HP fire (save basic Reflex); 25 HP acid (save basic Reflex); 30 HP electricity (save basic Reflex); 10 poison and enfeebled 1 for 1 min (save basic Fortitude also negates enfeebled); Flesh To Stone effects (save Will negates); Warp Mind effects (save Will negates); slowed 1 for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts Plane Shift effects)
Private Sanctum (O4 Abj): (10 min) 100' burst around touched location blocks sensory information, scrying, and mind-reading until next daily prep
Project Image (O7 Ill): (2) R30' Creates an illusory copy of the caster, with the same AC and saves, that can be used as a source of spells while sustained for up to 1 min or until damaged (heightened +2 extends maximum sustain by 10 min)
Protection (O1 Abj): (2) Touched gains +1 AC and saves vs. creatures of specified alignment, and +3 vs. summoned creatures and on control effects, for 1 min
Prying Eye (O5 Div): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows the caster to see from the target location and that can be moved 30' each rd while sustained
Quivering Palm (O8 Nec): (2) A successful Strike allows the caster to inflict stunned 3 and 80 HP on the target any time within 1 month (save Fortitude inflicts stunned 1 and 40 HP and ends the spell; critical success ends the spell; critical failure kills the target) (heightened +1 inflicts +10 HP, or +5 HP on a successful save)
Ray Of Enfeeblement (O1 Nec): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts enfeebled 2 for 1 min (critical success increases by 1 step) (save Fortitude inflicts enfeebled 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 3)
Read Aura (O0 Div): (1 min) R30' Allows the caster to detect whether an object is magical and the related school of magic (heightened 3rd allows detection on 10 objects; 6th allows detection on unlimited objects)
Read Omens (O4 Div): (10 min) Caster receives a clue or advice about a proposed activity up to 1 week in the future
Remake (O10 Con): (1 hr) Fully re-creates a known object up to 5' cu
Remove Curse (O4 Nec): (10 min) Allows a counteract attempt vs. one curse affecting touched
Remove Fear (O2 Enc): (2) Allows a counteract attempt vs. 1 fear effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Remove Paralysis (O2 Nec): (2) Allows a counteract attempt vs. 1 paralysis effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Repulsion (O6 Abj): (2) Up to 40' emanation prevents creatures from approaching (save Will inflicts difficult terrain; critical success negates)
Resilient Sphere (O4 Abj): (2) R30' Creates an impassible force sphere with AC 5, Harness 10, and 40 HP around the target for 1 min or until destroyed (save Reflex decreases sphere HP to 10; critical success negates)
Resist Energy (O2 Abj): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 vs. chosen energy type for 10 min (heightened 4th gives resistance 10 to 2 targets; 7th gives resistance 15 to 5 targets)
Resplendent Mansion (O9 Con): (1 min) R500' Creates a 300'x300' mansion, with entrances protected by Alarm effects and containing provisions for up to 150 people, until next daily prep
Restoration (O2 Nec): (1 min) Gives choice of a 2-step reduction to a clumsy, enfeebled, or stupefied condition, a 1-step reduction to two of these conditions, or a 1-stage reduction to a toxin affecting touched (heightened 4th allows reducing a drained condition, lessening a toxin by 2 stages, or reducing a non-permanent doomed condition by 1; 6th allows reducing a permanent doomed condition)
Restore Senses (O2 Nec): (2) Allows a counteract attempt vs. a magical blindness or deafness effect affecting touched
Retrocognition (O7 Div): (1 min) Caster receives impressions of 1 day of past events at the current location per 1 min concentration; traumatic events require a Will save to maintain the spell (heightened 8th gives impressions of 1 year per min; 9th gives impressions of 1 century per min)
Reverse Gravity (O7 Evo): (3) R120' Objects in a 20'x40' cylinder fall upward for 1 min
Rope Trick (O4 Con): (10 min) Touched rope leads to an extradimensional space that can hold 8 Medium creatures for 8 hr
Sanctuary (O1 Abj): (2) Prevents creatures from attacking touched for 1 min (save Will each rd negates for 1 rd; critical success ends spell; critical failure allows no further save attempts)
Scintillating Pattern (O8 Ill): (2) R120' 20' burst inflicts confused for 1d4 rd and dazzled in a 40' radius while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled only; critical failure inflicts stunned for 1d4 rd, then confused for the remaining duration)
Scrying (O6 Div): (10 min) Creates an invisible sensor that allows the caster to see the target creature while sustained for up to 10 min (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to glimpse the caster; critical failure allows the sensor to follow the target; an unmet target lowers the DC by 2; an unknown target lowers the DC by 10)
Secret Page (O3 Ill): (1 min) Makes the text on a touched page appear as different text unless a specified password is spoken
See Invisibility (O2 Div): (2) Allows the caster to treat invisible creatures and objects as concealed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last 8 hr)
Sending (O5 Div): (3) Allows the caster to send a 25-word message to a known creature
Shadow Blast (O5 Evo): (2) Choice of 30' cone, R120' 15' burst, or 50' line inflicts 5d8 HP of choice of damage type (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Shadow Siphon (O5 Ill): (R) R60' Allows a counteract attempt on a damaging trigger spell at +2 the spell level; reduces the damage by half if successful
Shadow Walk (O5 Con): (1 min) Allows the caster and 9 willing creatures to travel through the Shadow Plane at 20x Speed for 8 hr
Shatter (O2 Evo): (2) R30' Inflicts 2d10 HP sonic on an unattended target object, ignoring Hardness up to 4 (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP and ignores +2 Hardness)
Shield (O0 Abj): (1) Caster gains +1 AC and may use Shield Block with Hardness 5 until next turn (heightened +2 gives +5 Hardness)
Sigil (O0 Tra): (2) Inscribes a 1" sq magical mark on the touched object or creature for 1 week or until scrubbed off (heightened 3rd effects last 1 month; 5th effects last 1 year; 7th effects are permanent)
Silence (O2 Ill): (2) Touched target makes no sound for 1 min (heightened 4th affects a 10' radius around target)
Sleep (O1 Enc): (2) R30' 5' burst inflicts unconsciousness for 1 min or until a successful Perception check (save Will inflicts -1 Perception for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts unconsciousness for 1 hr or until a successful Perception check
Slow (O3 Tra): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 2)
Soothe (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Target regains 1d10+4 HP and gains +2 saves vs. mental effects for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +1d10+4 HP)
Soothing Ballad (O7 Enc): (2) R30' Caster and 9 allies gain choice of counteracted fear effects, counteracted paralysis, or 7d8 HP restored (heightened +1 restores +1d8 HP)
Sound Burst (O2 Evo): (2) R30' 10' burst inflicts 2d10 HP sonic (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts deafened for 1 min and stunned 1) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Spectral Hand (O2 Nec): (2) R120' Allows the caster to deliver touch spells via a crawling, spectral hand for 1 min or until the hand takes damage, which inflicts 1d6 HP to the caster
Spell Immunity (O4 Abj): (2) Gives touched an automatic counteract attempt vs. a specified spell until next daily prep
Spellwrack (O6 Abj): (2) R30' Each time the target is affected by a spell with a duration, it suffers 2d12 HP persistent force and the duration of all spells affecting it is reduced by 1 rd (save Will effects last 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts 4d12 HP)
Spirit Blast (O6 Nec): (2) R30' Target's spirit suffers 16d6 HP force (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Spirit Link (O1 Nec): (2) R30' Transfers 2 HP of damage each rd from the willing target to the caster for 10 min (heightened +1 transfers +2 HP)
Spirit Song (O8 Nec): (2) 60' cone inflicts 18d6 HP force, including on spirits (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Spiritual Epidemic (O8 Nec): (2) R120' Inflicts enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 for 1 min and enfeebled 1 and stupefied 1 permanently; also affects creatures casting divine or occult spells on target (save Will inflicts enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 for 1 rd only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 3 and stupefied 3 for 1 min and enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 permanently)
Spiritual Weapon (O2 Evo): (2) R120' Spectral weapon attacks once each rd, inflicting 1d8 HP force or weapon damage type, while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +2 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Status (O2 Div): (2) Allows caster to know touched's direction, distance, and conditions until next daily prep (heightened 4th R10' affects 10 targets)
Subconscious Suggestion (O5 Enc): (2) R30' Target follows a reasonable, 1 min suggestion upon a specified trigger until next daily prep (save Will negates; critical success allows target to detect attempt; critical failure inflicts following the suggestion for 1 hr) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Suggestion (O4 Enc): (2) R30' Target follows a reasonable suggestion for 1 min (save Will negates; critical success target notices spell; critical failure effects last 1 hr) (heightened 8th targets 10 creatures)
Summon Entity (O5 Con): (3) R30' A level 5 aberration appears and fights for the caster while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Summon Fey (O1 Con): (3) A level -1 fey appears and fights for the caster while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 fey; 3rd summons a level 2 fey; 4th summons a level 3 fey; 5th summons a level 5 fey; 6th summons a level 7 fey; 7th summons a level 9 fey; 8th summons a level 11 fey; 9th summons a level 13 fey; 10th summons a level 15 fey)
Synaptic Pulse (O5 Enc): (2) 30' emanation inflicts stunned 2 for 1 rd (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stunned for 1 rd)
Synesthesia (O5 Div): (2) R30' Inflicts a DC 5 flat check for concentration, treating all objects and creatures as concealed, clumsy 3, and -10 Speed for 1 min (save Will effects last 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stunned 2) (heightened 9th affects 5 targets)
Talking Corpse (O4 Nec): (10 min) Allows caster to gain truthful answers from touched corpse (save Will allows target to lie or refuse to answer; critical success prevents caster from resting for 24 hr; critical failure inflicts -2 on target Deception checks)
Telekinetic Haul (O5 Evo): (2) R120' Allows the caster to move an object up to 80 Bulk and 20' dimensions 20' per rd while sustained for up to 1 min
Telekinetic Maneuver (O2 Evo): (2) R60' Allows the caster to use a spell attack to Disarm, Shove, or Trip
Telekinetic Projectile (O0 Evo): (2) Allows the caster to use a loose object to make a spell attack that inflicts 1d6+4 HP of the appropriate damage type; critical success inflicts double HP (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Telepathic Bond (O5 Div): (1 min) Allows the caster and 4 willing creatures to communicate telepathically for 8 hr
Telepathic Demand (O9 Enc): (3) Allows the caster to exchange 25-word messages with an existing telepathic target, sending a Suggestion as part of the message (save Will gives immunity for 1 day; critical success gives immunity for 1 month)
Telepathy (O4 Div): (2) Allows the caster to communicate telepathically with any creature in a 30' radius (heightened 6th allows communication with creatures without a shared language)
Teleport (O6 Con): (10 min) Transports the caster and 4 willing creatures or objects up to 100 miles to a point near a specified known location (heightened 7th transports 1000 miles; 8th transports anywhere on the same planet; 9th transports to any planet in the same system; 9th transports to any planet in the same galaxy)
Time Stop (O10 Tra): (3) Allows the caster to perform 3 rd of actions that don't affect others until the spell ends
Tongues (O5 Div): (2) Allows the target to understand and speak all languages for 1 hr (heightened 7th lasts for 8 hr)
Touch Of Idiocy (O2 Enc): (2) Inflicts stupefied 2 (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts stupefied 4)
Triple Time (O0 Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +10' Speed for 1 rd
True Seeing (O6 Div): (2) R60' Allows the caster to see through illusions and transmutations for 10 min
True Strike (O1 Div): (1) Caster's next Strike in same turn uses the better of two rolls, ignores concealed or hidden, and ignores circumstance penalties
True Target (O7 Div): (1) R60' Allies' attacks within 1 rd on a designated creature ignore concealed or hidden status and gain the best of two rolls
Uncontrollable Dance (O8 Enc): (2) Touched suffers flat-footed and no Reactions for 1 min and spends 2 actions each turn dancing (save Will effects last 3 rd and target spends 1 action each turn dancing; critical success negates; critical failure effects last 1 min and target spends all actions each rd dancing)
Undetectable Alignment (O2 Abj): (1 min) Touched appears neutral to alignment detection until next daily prep
Unfathomable Song (O9 Enc): (2) R120' Randomly inflicts frightened 2, confused for 1 rd, stupefied 4 for 1 rd, or blinded for 1 rd on 5 targets while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will negates for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure replaces frightened 2 with stunned for 1 rd and stupefied 1)
Unrelenting Observation (O8 Div): (2) R100' 5 targets in a 20' burst can see a 6th target for 1 hr (save Will effects last 1 min; critical success negates)
Unseen Servant (O1 Con): (3) R60' Invisible servant obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained
Vampiric Exsanguination (O6 Nec): (2) 30' cone inflicts 12d6 HP negative, giving the caster temporary HP for 1 min equal to half that inflicted on the most-affected target (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Vampiric Touch (O3 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts 6d6 HP negative, giving the caster temporary HP for 1 min equal to half the inflicted damage (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Veil (O4 Ill): (2) Up to 10 creatures appear as different, similar creatures for 1 hr (heightened 5th also disguises voices and scents; 7th targets may appear as specific individuals)
Ventriloquism (O1 Ill): (2) Allows caster to project its voice up to 60' for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects last 1 hr and allow changing voice quality; requires an active Perception to attempt to disbelieve)
Vibrant Pattern (O6 Ill): (2) R120' 10' burst dazzles and blinds creatures while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled only; critical failure blinds for 1 min)
Visions Of Danger (O7 Ill): (3) R500' 30' burst inflicts 8d8 HP mental for 1 min (save basic Will; critical success allows an attempt to disbelieve that negates the effects) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Wail Of The Banshee (O9 Nec): (2) 40' emanation inflicts 8d10 HP negative and drained 1d4 (save Fortitude inflicts HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and drained 4)
Wall Of Force (O6 Evo): (3) R30' Creates an invisible 50'x20' wall with AC 10, Harness 30, and 60 HP that blocks physical effects and corporeal, incorporeal, and ethereal creatures for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +20 HP)
Wanderer's Guide (O3 Div): (1 min) Reveals a route to a specified destination and reduces the movement penalty from difficult terrain by half until next daily prep
Warp Mind (O7 Enc): (2) R120' Inflicts confused for 1 min (save Will inflicts confused for 1 action; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent confusion)
Weird (O9 Ill): (2) R120' Inflicts 16d6 HP mental and frightened 2 (save Will inflicts half HP and frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts death on a failed Fortitude save or double HP, frightened 2 and fleeing (critical success negates fleeing) on success)
Wholeness Of Body (O2 Nec): (1) Caster regains 8 HP or may attempt to counteract 1 poison or disease (heightened +1 restores +8 HP)
Wild Winds Stance (O4 Evo): (1) Caster may use R30' unarmed strikes to inflict 1d6 HP bludgeoning and gains +2 AC vs. ranged attacks until leaving the stance
Wind Jump (O5 Tra): (1) Caster gains 25' fly speed, ending each turn on the ground, for 1 min (heightened 6th caster may attempt a DC 30 Acrobatics to avoid falling at the end of turn)
Zealous Conviction (O6 Enc): (2) R30' 10 targets gain 12 temporary HP, gain +2 Will vs. mental effects, and must comply with the caster's requests for 10 min (save Will after fulfilling a repugnant request ends spell) (heightened +1 gives 18 temporary HP and +3 Will)
Zone Of Truth (O3 Enc): (2) R30' 20' burst prevents lies and inflicts -2 Deception for 10 min (save Will inflicts -2 Deception only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts -4 Deception)
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage occult spells/Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Enigma: Knows the True Strike occult spell
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Occult)
Loremaster's Etude: Knows the Loremaster's Etude occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Occult Spellcasting: May learn spells from the occult tradition
Polymath: Knows the Unseen Servant occult spell
Triple Time: Knows the Triple Time occult cantrip
Adapted Cantrip: Knows a cantrip from a different tradition
Reach Spell: (1) May extend spell range by 30'
Signature Spells: May freely heighten a chosen spell of each level
